about_the_game:
《AI Detective Collection》

《AI Detective Collection》 is a detective decryption game that gathers the latest AI large language model technology, which brings players into a reasoning world full of suspense and challenges. Here, you will be incarnated as a keen detective, using your intelligence and the unlimited potential of AI assistant to explore complex cases in depth and expose the truth hidden under the surface.

In the game, you will face a series of well-designed cases, each of which is a test of your reasoning ability. You need to collect and analyze clues, examine evidence, and use logical thinking and deduction skills to solve the mystery step by step. the AI assistant will be your strong backing, providing key information and analysis to help you make the right judgments in the reasoning process.

《AI Detective Collection》 is characterized by its unique AI interactive experience. the AI assistant not only provides clues and evidence, but also engages in an in-depth dialogue with you, reacting to your choices and actions. This high level of interactivity and realism makes players feel as if they are in a real detective story, experiencing an unprecedented sense of immersion.

In addition, each case in the game is designed with core and fringe issues, and players need to keep trying and exploring, combining their own insight and the technical support of the AI assistant, in order to gradually unlock the clues and ultimately find the truth of the case.

《AI Detective Collection》 is not just a game, it is a new intelligent experience, an exploration of the potential of AI technology. It allows players to feel the intelligence and power of AI while enjoying the fun of the game. Now, let's join AI Detective Collection, challenge the limits of our own reasoning, and uncover the mystery behind each case!

开发者的话

亲爱的侦探们，你们好呀！这里有一些小小的解释关于为什么游戏中需要内购买聊天次数哦。你们知道吗，AI聊天可是需要一定的算力成本的呢，如果你们无限制地聊天，那对我们可是会产生超大的成本哦 (；´Д`A

所以，我们希望你们能够尽可能地就重点内容和角色进行聊天，仅用游戏赠送的次数进行聊天也是可以破案的哦 (〃'▽'〃)

再告诉你们一个小秘密，每当你们通关一关后，聊天次数会增加80次哦，如果你们能够完美通关的话，还能再增加50次呢！ヾ(≧▽≦*)o

希望你们的侦探大脑能够充分发挥作用，在尽可能少的聊天次数下成功破解案件哦。加油，我相信你们一定可以的！٩( 'ω' )و
